title: Almond, cranberry and orange biscotti
description: These biscotti can be served as they are, or dipped in chocolate and coated in nuts with a sprinkle of edible glitter. Pack them in jars or cellophane bags and decorate with a ribbon and a label for a pretty Christmas gift.
ingredients: 1 tsp aniseed extract (optional) or ¼ tsp almond extract
